entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
